setting.location: Maintenance corridor of research station orbiting planet Solaris

characters.appearance: Man, early 30s, brown hair, shocked expression, stepping carefully around debris
characters.clothing: Station uniform, now appearing less pristine
characters.position: Moving cautiously through cluttered corridor, one hand touching wall for support
characters.action: Surveying damage and neglect with growing alarm, pausing to examine broken equipment

scene.mainElements: Deteriorated corridor with scattered debris, broken equipment, oil stains on floor, malfunctioning lighting creating patches of darkness
scene.details: Metal debris scattered across floor, dark stains of unknown liquids, sparking electrical connections, damaged wall panels hanging loose, abandoned tools and parts, flickering overhead lights, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Corridor extending into darkness, glimpses of more damaged areas beyond, pipes and conduits exposed where wall panels have fallen, emergency lighting providing uneven illumination
scene.atmosphere: Decay and abandonment, realization that the station is falling apart, growing sense that something fundamental has gone wrong, professional confidence beginning to crack

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot showing extent of deterioration
composition.focus: Character's shocked reaction to station condition
composition.depth: Debris field in foreground, character navigating in middle ground, damaged corridor extending into dark background

colorPalette.usageNotes: Cool tones dominate with pops of vibrant neon lighting

lineArt.texture: smooth digital, hard edges on tech

lighting.intensity: high contrast (bright neon vs deep shadow)
lighting.highlights: lens flares, neon glows on surfaces

rendering.texture: smooth with textured brushes for atmosphere
rendering.detailLevel: high in focal points (tech details), looser elsewhere

perspective: dynamic perspective (wide-angle vistas or low-angle hero shots)
